# nw_parameters_attribution_t

**Enumeration**

The entities that can make a network request.

## Declaration

```swift
enum nw_parameters_attribution_t
```

## Overview

Use one of these values when setting the `attribution` parameter of a network request with the [doc://com.apple.network/documentation/Network/nw_parameters_get_attribution(_:)] method. If you don’t set a value, the system assumes [doc://com.apple.network/documentation/Network/nw_parameters_attribution_t/developer].

## Request Sources

- **nw_parameters_attribution_t.developer**: A developer-initiated network request.
- **nw_parameters_attribution_t.user**: The user explicitly directs the app to make a network request.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Traffic Attribution

- **Inspecting app activity data**: Verify that your app accesses only the user data and network resources that you expect it to access.
- **Indicating the source of network activity**: Control whether the App Privacy Report attributes network traffic to the app or to the user.
- **nw_parameters_set_attribution(_:_:)**: Sets a flag that indicates whether the network request originates from the developer or the user.
- **nw_parameters_get_attribution(_:)**: Gets a flag that indicates whether the network request originates from the developer or the user.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
